document.discussion_title: Unseasonably stormy weather behind UK sea deaths
document.topic_text: Media playback is unsupported on your device Unseasonably stormy weather behind UK sea deaths 22 August 2016 Last updated at 08:55 BST Coastguards are warning people to stay a safe distance from rough seas after six people died around Britain. "It's not often we see winds of such high strength at this time of year," national maritime operations commander for the UK Coastguard Tris Newey told the Today programme.
